name: inabatron
description:
janky robotron: 2084 homage made from scratch by one idiot in under 46 hours for touhou fan game jam 5 (theme: "folklore, myth, legend")

help tewi fight against wave after wave of dangerous yokai from the legend of the hare of inaba. collect all the rabbits on the screen to advance waves. shoot or avoid the yokai and their attacks -- and don't let them get to the rabbits first. there are no bombs or power-ups, but you'll get an extra life every 60,000 points.

t. boddy: programming, design, art, bgm, sfx

controls:
wasd, left analog stick, or d-pad: move
arrow keys, right anlog stick or face buttons: shoot
z, enter: confirm in menu
r or select: return to menu
esc or start: pause game
only tested on xbox360 controller

touhou and all characters by ZUN, made in accordance to guideline for derivatives as always

thanks to: touhou fan game jam discord server, sicarius

source code available at https://github.com/tboddy/inabatron, do whatever you want with it
